text: The President of the Indonesia Republic is the head of state of Indonesia. The current President is Prabowo Subianto. ==Presidents== Portrait Name Term of office Political party Vice president(s) 1 Sukarno rowspan="2" 1945 Independent 1 Mohammad Hatta During this interval, Chief of Staff of the Indonesian Army Suharto was the acting president. 2 Suharto 1968 1973 1978 1983 1988 1993 1998 Golkar 2 Hamengkubuwono IX 3 Adam Malik 4 Umar Wirahadikusumah 5 Sudharmono 6 Try Sutrisno 7 B. J. Habibie 3 B. J. Habibie — Golkar 4 Abdurrahman Wahid rowspan="2" 1999 National Awakening Party 8 Megawati Sukarnoputri 5 Megawati Sukarnoputri rowspan="2" — Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle 9 Hamzah Haz 6 Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono 2004 2009 years Democratic Party 10 Jusuf Kalla 11 Boediono 7 Joko Widodo 2014 2019 years Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle 12 Jusuf Kalla Ma'ruf Amin 13 8 Prabowo Subianto 20 October 2024 2024 Great Indonesia Movement Party 14 Gibran Rakabuming Raka ==Notes== ==References==
title: President of Indonesia
